StartFacilitator.Heading: Kiosk Locked
StartFacilitator.SubHeading: Please contact a facilitator to unlock the kiosk

Start.Heading: Welcome!
Start.SubHeading:
Press "Start" to Begin
the Online Voting Signup Process

RealCredentialIntro.Heading: [|Real ]Voting Credential
RealCredentialIntro.Body:
We will now create a [|real] voting credential.
You will use this credential to cast votes[| that count] in elections.

RealCredentialIntro2.Heading: [|Real ]Voting Credential
RealCredentialIntro2.Body:
After creating your[| real] voting credential:

• Keep the credential safe.
• Activate it for voting on a device you trust.
• Never give your credential to anyone else.

RealCredentialCreateInfo.Title: [|Real ]Voting Credential Steps Overview
RealCredentialCreateInfo.Heading: [|Real ]Voting Credential
RealCredentialCreateInfo.Step1:
Step 1:
You scan your check-in ticket.
RealCredentialCreateInfo.Step2:
Step 2:
Kiosk prints a symbol and
one QR code.
RealCredentialCreateInfo.TearWarning: Do NOT remove the receipt yet
RealCredentialCreateInfo.Step3:
Step 3:
You pick
and scan an envelope with the same symbol as the receipt.
RealCredentialCreateInfo.Step4:
Step 4:
Kiosk prints the rest of your receipt.

RealCredentialStepsQuiz.Heading: Quiz!
RealCredentialStepsQuiz.Body:
While creating your [|real ]voting credential,
when do you pick and scan an envelope to the kiosk?
(Check all that apply)
Options: After a symbol and three QR codes are printed
After a symbol and one QR code is printed
CorrectOptions: After a symbol and one QR code is printed

RealCredentialStepsQuizResult.Heading: Quiz Result
RealCredentialStepsQuizResult.SubHeading:
While creating your [|real ]voting credential,
when do you pick and scan an envelope to the kiosk?
RealCredentialStepsQuizResult.Body: Only when the kiosk prints a symbol and one QR code, otherwise report this kiosk to the nearest government official.

RealCredentialFirstPrint.Heading:
Create Your [Voting|Real] Credential[
Step 2$]
RealCredentialFirstPrint.Body: Confirm that the receipt printer has printed a ? and one QR code.

RealCredentialScanEnvelope.Heading:
Create Your [Voting|Real] Credential[
Step 3$]
RealCredentialScanEnvelope.SubHeading:
Choose and Scan an Envelope[
with a ?$]

RealCredentialScanEnvelopeError.Heading:
Create Your [Voting|Real] Credential[
Step 3$]
RealCredentialScanEnvelopeError.Body:
You have scanned an envelope containing a ?, which does not match with the ? printed on the receipt.

Press "Continue" to scan another envelope.

RealCredentialSecondPrint.Heading:
Create Your [Voting|Real] Credential[
Step 4$]
RealCredentialSecondPrint.Body: Confirm that the receipt printer has printed two more QR codes.

RealCredentialFinalize.Heading: Complete Your [Voting|Real] Credential
RealCredentialFinalize.Step1: Remove the receipt from the receipt printer.
RealCredentialFinalize.Step2: Then insert the receipt into the envelope.

RealCredentialSuccess.Heading: Mark Your [Voting|Real] Credential
RealCredentialSuccess.Body:
Using the supplied pen, mark your
[|real ]voting credential to [personalize your credential|help you remember later that is your real credential].

RealCredentialStorageQuiz.Heading: Quiz!
RealCredentialStorageQuiz.Body:
What should you do with your [|real ]voting credential after leaving the government office?
(Check all that apply)
Options: Activate it yourself on a device that you trust
Give it to someone else to activate on my behalf
CorrectOptions: Activate it yourself on a device that you trust

RealCredentialStorageQuizResult.Heading: Quiz Result
RealCredentialStorageQuizResult.SubHeading: What should you do with your [|real ]voting credential after leaving the government office?
RealCredentialStorageQuizResult.Body: You must keep possession of your [|real] voting credential and activate it on a device you trust for voting.

CoercionIntro.Heading: Coercion / Vote Buying
CoercionIntro.Body:
Your [|real ]voting credential is for your use alone.

It is illegal for anyone to ask for your [|real ]credential, to offer money for it, or to pressure you to vote in any particular way.

TestCredentialIntro.Heading: Test Voting Credential
TestCredentialIntro.Body:
A test credential looks like a real credential, but votes cast with a test credential do not count in elections.

You may give or sell a test credential to anyone, including someone trying to buy or coerce your vote.

TestCredentialUsageQuiz.Heading: Quiz!
TestCredentialUsageQuiz.Body: Which of the following purposes can you use a test credential for? (check all that apply)
Options: To resist pressure from someone to vote a particular way.
To sell to someone who offers to buy your real credential.
To cast a vote that counts in an election.
CorrectOptions: To resist pressure from someone to vote a particular way.
To sell to someone who offers to buy your real credential.

TestCredentialUsageQuizResult.Heading: Quiz Result
TestCredentialUsageQuizResult.SubHeading: Which of the following purposes can you use a test credential for?
TestCredentialUsageQuizResult.Body:
You may use a test credential to:
• resist pressure from someone to vote a particular way.
• sell to someone who offers to buy your real credential.
• teach kids about voting.

TestCredentialCreateQuestion.Heading: Test Voting Credential
TestCredentialCreateQuestion.Body: Would you like to create a test credential?

TestCredentialSteps.Heading:
Test Voting Credential Steps
Overview
TestCredentialSteps.Step1:
Step 1:
You pick and present an envelope to the kiosk
TestCredentialSteps.Step2:
Step 2:
Kiosk prints a receipt all at once.

TestCredentialFinalize.Heading:
Complete Test Credential
[Step 2$]
TestCredentialFinalize.Step1: Remove the receipt from the receipt printer.
TestCredentialFinalize.Step2: Then insert the receipt into the envelope.

TestCredentialSuccess.Heading: Mark Your Test Credential
TestCredentialSuccess.Body:
Mark your test voting credential with a pen
so that you can distinguish it later from your
real voting credential.

Proceed with creating another test credential?

CredentialDistinguishQuiz.Heading: Quiz!
CredentialDistinguishQuiz.Body:
Who can distinguish your test credential
from your real credential?
(Check all that apply)
Options: Only myself with my pen markings.
CorrectOptions: Only myself with my pen markings.

CredentialDistinguishQuizResult.Heading: Quiz Result
CredentialDistinguishQuizResult.SubHeading:
Who can distinguish your test credential
from your real credential?
CredentialDistinguishQuizResult.Body: Only you with your pen marks.

Finish.Heading: Successful Registration!
Finish.Body:
Take your credential with you to the check-out desk, and do not forget:
• Activate your [|real ]credential on a device you trust.
• Never give your [|real ]credential to anyone else.

FinishWithTest.Heading: Successful Registration!
FinishWithTest.Body:
Take your credential[|s] with you to the check-out desk, and do not forget:
• Activate your [|real ]credential on a device you trust.
• Your [|real ]credential cast votes that count.
[|• Your test credential(s) cast votes that do not count.
• Your pen marks are the only way to distinguish them.
• Show any one of your credentials at check-out.]

GoToCheckOutDesk.Heading: Thank you for Registering!
GoToCheckOutDesk.Body:
Please go to the check-out desk and
show [your voting credential|any one of your credentials].
